section.title: XMLBeans Version 1 Project Management
section.p: XMLBeans Version 1 is the current stable release

section.title: XMLBeans Version 2 Project Management
section.p: You can find information about XMLBeans 2.0 planning at XMLBeans Feature Plan if you want to provide ideas or feedback on this planning it is best to post it to either dev@xmlbeans.apache.org or user@xmlbeans.apache.org.

section.title: XMLBeans Bug Lists
section.p: Open XMLBeans bugs (from JIRA): JIRA XMLBeans
